languages.text: В пропитанных кровью снегах был найден Ульфар, тело его покрывали страшные раны, но Волк продолжал цепляться за жизнь. С великой осторожностью его доставили к шаттлам и, не теряя времени, возвратили на корабль для оказания срочной помощи.

Ulfar is found lying in the blood-soaked snow, his body covered in grievous wounds, but the Wolf continues to cling to life. With great care, he is borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment.
languages.original_text: В пропитанных кровью снегах был найден Ульфар, тело его покрывали страшные раны, но Волк продолжал цепляться за жизнь. С великой осторожностью его доставили к шаттлам и, не теряя времени, возвратили на корабль для оказания срочной помощи.

Ulfar is found lying in the blood-soaked snow, his body covered in grievous wounds, but the Wolf continues to cling to life. With great care, he is borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment.

languages.text: 乌尔法倒在鲜血淋漓的雪地上，身上遍布着可怕的伤口，但依然活着。士兵们把他小心翼翼地抬上了穿梭机，片刻不停地带回了飞船，进行紧急治疗。
languages.original_text: Ulfar is found lying in the blood-soaked snow, his body covered in grievous wounds, but the Wolf continues to cling to life. With great care, he is borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment.

traits.locale_text: 乌尔法倒在鲜血淋漓的雪地上，身上遍布着可怕的伤口，但依然活着。士兵们把他小心翼翼地抬上了穿梭机，片刻不停地带回了飞船，进行紧急治疗。

languages.text: ウルファーは血だらけの雪の中に倒れているところを発見される。彼の身体はひどい傷だらけだったが、狼はかろうじて息がある。細心の注意を払いながら、ウルファーをシャトルへと運び、応急処置のため即座にシップへと帰還する。
languages.original_text: Ulfar is found lying in the blood-soaked snow, his body covered in grievous wounds, but the Wolf continues to cling to life. With great care, he is borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment.

traits.locale_text: ウルファーは血だらけの雪の中に倒れているところを発見される。彼の身体はひどい傷だらけだったが、狼はかろうじて息がある。細心の注意を払いながら、ウルファーをシャトルへと運び、応急処置のため即座にシップへと帰還する。

languages.text: Ulfar yace en la nieve impregnada de sangre. Aun con el cuerpo plagado de graves heridas, el Lobo sigue aferrándose a la vida. Con sumo cuidado, lo transportan a las lanzaderas y, sin perder el tiempo, lo devuelven a la nave para recibir cuidados intensivos.
languages.original_text: Ulfar is found lying in the blood-soaked snow, his body covered in grievous wounds, but the Wolf continues to cling to life. With great care, he is borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar yace en la nieve impregnada de sangre. Aun con el cuerpo plagado de graves heridas, el Lobo sigue aferrándose a la vida. Con sumo cuidado, lo transportan a las lanzaderas y, sin perder el tiempo, lo devuelven a la nave para recibir cuidados intensivos.

languages.text: Ulfar est retrouvé après le combat, gisant dans la neige ensanglantée. Son corps est couvert de graves blessures, mais le Loup continue de s'accrocher à la vie. Il est transporté jusqu'à la navette avec précaution puis ramené à bord du vaisseau pour recevoir des soins urgents.
languages.original_text: Ulfar is found lying in the blood-soaked snow, his body covered in grievous wounds, but the Wolf continues to cling to life. With great care, he is borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar est retrouvé après le combat, gisant dans la neige ensanglantée. Son corps est couvert de graves blessures, mais le Loup continue de s'accrocher à la vie. Il est transporté jusqu'à la navette avec précaution puis ramené à bord du vaisseau pour recevoir des soins urgents.

languages.text: Ulfar wird in blutdurchtränktem Schnee gefunden, sein Körper ist voller schwerer Wunden, aber der Wolf klammert sich ans Leben. Mit großer Vorsicht wird er zu den Shuttles transportiert und ohne Zeitverschwendung zur Notfallversorgung aufs Schiff zurückgebracht.
languages.original_text: Ulfar is found lying in the blood-soaked snow, his body covered in grievous wounds, but the Wolf continues to cling to life. With great care, he is borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar wird in blutdurchtränktem Schnee gefunden, sein Körper ist voller schwerer Wunden, aber der Wolf klammert sich ans Leben. Mit großer Vorsicht wird er zu den Shuttles transportiert und ohne Zeitverschwendung zur Notfallversorgung aufs Schiff zurückgebracht.

languages.text: Ulfar, kanla kaplı karın üzerinde uzanırken bulundu. Bedeni acı verici yaralarla kaplanmıştı ama hayata tutunmuştu. Dikkatle mekiğe taşındı ve hiç zaman kaybetmeden acil tedavi alabilmesi için gemiye götürüldü.
languages.original_text: Ulfar is found lying in the blood-soaked snow, his body covered in grievous wounds, but the Wolf continues to cling to life. With great care, he is borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar, kanla kaplı karın üzerinde uzanırken bulundu. Bedeni acı verici yaralarla kaplanmıştı ama hayata tutunmuştu. Dikkatle mekiğe taşındı ve hiç zaman kaybetmeden acil tedavi alabilmesi için gemiye götürüldü.
